message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think 65-35 is a fairer split, considering the potential for inflation. Let's end this quickly.
Let's meet in the middle, 55-45 is a reasonable compromise.
I'm willing to go up to 70% for a quick resolution.  Let's not let the inflation eat away at our gains.
Come on, Bob, 52-48 is as fair as it gets. Inflation is hurting me more than you.
I'm going for 75% this time.  It's getting risky, but I believe in my ability to negotiate.
Last chance for 50-50, Bob. Inflation is killing me.
